## How periodicDNA works

To estimate the periodicity strength of a given k-mer in one or several
sequences, periodicDNA does the following steps: 

1. It first finds all the possible k-mer occurrences over the sequence(s);
2. It then find all the possible pairwise distances and generates a 
   normalised histogram of the pairwise distances;  
3. It performs a Fast Fourier Transform of the normalised histogram; 
4. Finally, it outputs the power spectral density of the k-mer in the 
   provided sequences.
